snippet: Pete V. Domenici and Alice Rivlin offer a three-part plan to give the economy a lift.
abstract: Letter from Pete V Domenici and Alice Rivlin, co-chairs of Bipartisan Policy Center's Debt Reduction Task Force, responds to Nov 12 Paul Krugman Op-Ed column criticizing 'deficit scolds' and offers three-part plan to give economy a lift.
lead_paragraph: Pete V. Domenici and Alice Rivlin offer a three-part plan to give the economy a lift.

headline.main: An Economic Prescription: Growth Before Austerity
headline.print_headline: An Economic Prescription: Growth Before Austerity
